attributes.title: GRAB HER BY THE 🤬
attributes.review: THIS IS A WASTE OF STORAGE🧚🏼‍♀️ THIS AINT IT😤 BUNKER BOY 👺When ariana grande said breathe 🧚🏼‍♀️✨💅 she didnt ment you💅✨🧚🏼‍♀️ oh and your not going to win the 2020 election oh and one more thing that kinda bothered me is how everything that comes out of bunker boys mouth is stupid so can you please do me a favor. 🧚🏻 ✨𝓼𝓱𝓾𝓽 𝓽𝓱𝓮 𝓯𝓾𝓬𝓴 𝓾𝓹✨🧚🏻

attributes.title: yikes
attributes.review: not sum1 who gets head over heels abt politics, but just enough to b self aware of this man’s manners and actions 😽 despite his appalling behavior, he fails to represent the U.S. as a whole. we are ‼️not‼️ a reality TV show for the rest of the world to watch😺 alr just don’t ban tik tok🥺

attributes.title: I want Obama back!!
attributes.review: Awful!!! Extremely inappropriate, when I first went on the app, they asked me for my phone number and of course I’m not giving my phone number to a racist, s*x offender!!!!

attributes.title: What is with the Cheetos
attributes.review: When you open the app just Cheetos until after thirty minutes it’s a picture of trump saying vote for me except his skin is even more orange I just think it’s weird

attributes.title: TERRIBLE APP
attributes.review: I do not recommend this app at all. The app is programmed to listen to you even when the app is closed. Every time it heard my parents or friends voices it started playing p0rn EXTREMELY LOUD. This app caused me a lot of mental and physical pain. DONT GET IT.

attributes.title: SAD
attributes.review: Trump supporters don’t get this app this app has made my phone extremely slow! I swear once I deleted the app it helped so much! I wish I could give this thing zero stars if I could.

attributes.title: 🧚✨🧚‍♀️💕👑🧚💫
attributes.review:
I was a girl in the village doing alright
Then I became a princess overnight
Now I gotta figure out how to do it right
So much to learn and see

Up in the castle with my new family
In a school that's just for royalty
A whole enchanted world is waiting for me
I'm so excited to be

I'm finding out what being royal's all about
Making my way it's an adventure everyday

It's gonna be my time
To show them all that I'm
Sofia the First!

attributes.title: trump app review
attributes.review: The app took so long to download and keeps sending me texts messages even after i deleted it, although i never gave the app mt phone number. very creepy

attributes.title: to the people...
attributes.review:
dear everyone reading this review,

do not. i repeat. DO NOT. download this app. this app has jailbroken my phone, to which i had to drive to the apple store to buy a new one. this app basically costed me $1,000!

attributes.title: Could it be any worse
attributes.review: Literally took a day to download😕 Wouldn’t let me log in to support the president or anything! This app is trash in my opinion. Don’t waste your time downloading it.
